Want to attract more qualified students, in more diverse countries, with only one point of contact?
Learn more about becoming a partner with Adventus.io

LEARN MORE

FREQUENTLY ASKED

Your questions answered

What is the transaction fee?

This is a standard banking and exchange conversion fee charged for processing credits cards and foreign currencies.

Do you charge an application fee?

No, we don’t charge any application fees.

What is a source country?

The country in which you operate your business. For recruiters who recruit from more than 1 source country, the Power and Enterprise plans are most suitable.

Can I upgrade/downgrade my plan?

Yes, we offer month-to-month plans so you can easily upgrade or downgrade. The specific implications depend on which plans you’re moving between. Please contact us directly to discuss specific scenarios.
